name: The Lodge
description:
A first-person, psychological horror game, The Lodge takes players on a journey into the horrors of a twisted mind.
Set in 1967, Owen Thomas - recently returned from Vietnam - wakes up to find himself in a secluded lodge. Using what few resources he has, he must figure out what’s real before it’s too late.

Over the past three months we have been making a game and this is the fruit of our labor. The teams hard work and dedication to this game brought us together and made for some pretty good fun. We know it needs work, and we ain't promising a release date anytime soon. Enjoy the game

Features:
Puzzle Solving
In-depth Story
Immersive Environment
Mystery
Suspense
Chase Sequences

Warning: This Game contains flashing lights and disturbing content. This is a work of fiction and any events related to real life events or people is completely coincidental.
